mapper.select: SELECT spusa.id as spusa_id, spusav.id as spusav_id,spusa.*,spusav.*,IF(skusav.sku_id,1,0) AS isChecked FROM product_spu_sale_attr spusa INNER JOIN `product_spu_sale_attr_value` spusav ON spusa.product_id = spusav.`product_id` AND spusa.sale_attr_id = spusav.`sale_attr_id` AND spusa.product_id = #{productId} LEFT JOIN product_sku_sale_attr_value skusav ON spusa.sale_attr_id = skusav.`sale_attr_id` AND spusav.`id` = skusav.`sale_attr_value_id` AND sku_id = #{skuId}
